name: Ajuste Final
description:
Interdisciplinary work of the Game Design course at Anhembi Morumbi University (2020/1). I've programmed a couple of things, I've worked as a producer and I've done part of the Level Design, the HUD, menu, animation configuration, cutscenes using Unity timeline and the narrative part.

Co-produced with Alexandre Rugolo, Gustavo Martins, Ígor Cabral, João Gozzi, Tiago Sabioni and Vitor Fortes.
